body_content.explanation: a person or team that reaches the quarter-finals (= any of the four games in a competition that decide which players or teams will play in the two semifinals):
examples: The World Cup quarter-finalists were England, Brazil, Turkey, South Korea, Germany, US, Spain and Senegal.
The twice Olympic quarter finalist said last week that this was her last chance.
He has played for Champions League quarterfinalists Bayern and Barcelona as well as for United and Chelsea.
